trans-unit.source: After matching all 6 digits and then failing to match "foo", the normal action of the matcher is to try again with only 5 digits matching the \d+ item, and then with 4, and so on, before ultimately failing. Once-only subpatterns provide the means for specifying that once a portion of the pattern has matched, it is not to be re-evaluated in this way, so the matcher would give up immediately on failing to match "foo" the first time. The notation is another kind of special parenthesis, starting with (?> as in this example: (?>\d+)bar
trans-unit.target: 在匹配所有6位数字之后，然后又没有匹配“ foo”，匹配器的正常操作是在仅5位与\ d +项目匹配的数字之后再尝试4位，依此类推，以此类推，直到最终失败。仅一次的子模式提供了一种手段，用于指定一旦模式的一部分已匹配，就不能以这种方式对其进行重新评估，因此匹配器将在第一次不匹配“ foo”时立即放弃。该符号是另一种特殊的括号，以（？>开头，如本例所示：（？> \ d +）bar

trans-unit.source: After processing a request, any semaphores acquired by the process but not explicitly released will be released automatically and a warning will be generated.
trans-unit.target: 在处理完一个请求后,过程中获取的但没有明确释放的信号灯会自动释放,并产生警告。

trans-unit.source: After removing the semaphore, it is no longer accessible.

trans-unit.source: After the socket socket has been created using socket_create() and bound to a name with socket_bind(), it may be told to listen for incoming connections on socket.
trans-unit.target: 插座后 socket 已使用创建socket_create（）和绑定到名称与socket_bind（） ，它可能会被告知要侦听传入的连接 socket 。

trans-unit.source: After the socket socket has been created using socket_create(), bound to a name with socket_bind(), and told to listen for connections with socket_listen(), this function will accept incoming connections on that socket. Once a successful connection is made, a new socket resource is returned, which may be used for communication. If there are multiple connections queued on the socket, the first will be used. If there are no pending connections, socket_accept() will block until a connection becomes present. If socket has been made non-blocking using socket_set_blocking() or socket_set_nonblock(), FALSE will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 插座后 socket 已使用创建socket_create（） ，绑定到名称与socket_bind（） ，并告诉侦听与连接socket_listen（）套接字上，此功能可以接受的连接。成功建立连接后，将返回一个新的套接字资源，该资源可用于通信。如果套接字上有多个连接排队，则将使用第一个。如果没有挂起的连接，socket_accept（）将阻塞，直到出现连接为止。如果 socket 使用已经取得了非阻塞socket_set_blocking（）或socket_set_nonblock（） ， FALSE 将被退回。

In other words, <var><var>$a</var></var> is an expression with the value of 5 as well. If everything works right, this is exactly what will happen.

trans-unit.source: All EvCheck watchers are queued just after Ev::run() has gathered the new events, but before it queues any callbacks for any received events. Thus, EvCheck watchers will be invoked before any other watchers of the same or lower priority within an event loop iteration.
trans-unit.target: 在Ev :: run（）收集新事件之后，但在将所有已接收事件的任何回调排队之前，所有EvCheck观察者都将排队。因此，在事件循环迭代中，将先调用EvCheck监视程序，然后再调用其他优先级相同或较低的监视程序。

trans-unit.source: All EvPrepare watchers are invoked just before Ev::run() starts. Thus, EvPrepare watchers are the last watchers invoked before the event loop sleeps or polls for new events.
trans-unit.target: 在Ev :: run（）启动之前，将调用所有EvPrepare监视程序。因此，EvPrepare观察者是事件循环休眠或轮询新事件之前最后调用的观察者。

trans-unit.source: All variables in the global scope of the sandbox environment are accessible as properties of the sandbox object. The first thing to note is that because of the way memory between these two threads is managed, object and resource variables can not currently be exchanged between interpreters. Additionally, all arrays are deep copied and any references will be lost. This also means that references between interpreters are not possible.
trans-unit.target: 沙盒环境全局范围内的所有变量都可以作为沙盒对象的属性访问。首先要注意的是,由于这两个线程之间的内存管理方式,对象和资源变量目前不能在解释器之间交换。此外,所有的数组都会被深度复制,任何引用都会丢失。这也意味着解释器之间无法进行引用。

This is only interesting when using host names that resolve addresses using more than one version of IP, possible values are CURL_IPRESOLVE_WHATEVER, CURL_IPRESOLVE_V4, CURL_IPRESOLVE_V6, by default CURL_IPRESOLVE_WHATEVER.

trans-unit.source: Allows you to control the number of colours used for antialiasing text. Allowed values are 4 and 16. The higher value is recommended for text sizes lower than 20, where the effect in text quality is quite visible. With bigger sizes, use 4. It's less computationally intensive.

trans-unit.source: Although technically unnecessary, the Phar::startBuffering() method can provide a significant performance boost when creating or modifying a Phar archive with a large number of files. Ordinarily, every time a file within a Phar archive is created or modified in any way, the entire Phar archive will be recreated with the changes. In this way, the archive will be up-to-date with the activity performed on it.
trans-unit.target: 尽管从技术上讲是不必要的，但是在创建或修改包含大量文件的Phar归档文件时，Phar :: startBuffering（）方法可以显着提高性能。通常，每次以任何方式创建或修改Phar归档文件中的文件时，都会随着更改重新创建整个Phar归档文件。这样，归档文件将是最新的，并且已对其执行活动。

trans-unit.source: Although the __autoload() function can also be used for autoloading classes and interfaces, it's preferred to use the spl_autoload_register() function. This is because it is a more flexible alternative (enabling for any number of autoloaders to be specified in the application, such as in third party libraries). For this reason, using __autoload() is discouraged and it may be deprecated in the future.
trans-unit.target: 尽管__autoload（）函数也可以用于自动加载类和接口，但最好使用spl_autoload_register（）函数。这是因为它是一种更灵活的选择（允许在应用程序（例如第三方库）中指定任意数量的自动加载器）。因此，不建议使用__autoload（），以后可能不建议使用它。

trans-unit.source: Although the user can send multiple queries at once, multiple queries cannot be sent over a busy connection. If a query is sent while the connection is busy, it waits until the last query is finished and discards all its results.
trans-unit.target: 虽然用户可以同时发送多个查询,但在繁忙的连接上不能发送多个查询。如果在连接繁忙时发送查询,则会等到最后一个查询结束并丢弃所有结果。

trans-unit.source: Although this function can handle dates all the way back to 4713 B.C., such use may not be meaningful. The calendar was created in 46 B.C., but the details did not stabilize until at least 8 A.D., and perhaps as late at the 4th century. Also, the beginning of a year varied from one culture to another - not all accepted January as the first month.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这个功能可以处理的日期可以一直追溯到公元前4713年,但这样的使用可能没有意义。公元前46年,历法被创造出来,但细节至少要到公元8年才稳定下来,也许要到4世纪。此外,一年的开始也因文化而异--并非所有文化都接受一月为第一个月。

trans-unit.source: Although this function can handle dates all the way back to 4714 B.C., such use may not be meaningful. The Gregorian calendar was not instituted until October 15, 1582 (or October 5, 1582 in the Julian calendar). Some countries did not accept it until much later. For example, Britain converted in 1752, The USSR in 1918 and Greece in 1923. Most European countries used the Julian calendar prior to the Gregorian.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这个功能可以处理一直到公元前4714年的日期,但这种使用可能没有意义。格里高利历直到1582年10月15日(或朱利安历的1582年10月5日)才开始实行。有些国家直到很久以后才接受它。例如,英国在1752年、苏联在1918年和希腊在1923年才改用。在格里高利历之前,大多数欧洲国家都使用朱利安历。

trans-unit.source: Although this function can handle dates all the way back to the year 1 (3761 B.C.), such use may not be meaningful. The Jewish calendar has been in use for several thousand years, but in the early days there was no formula to determine the start of a month. A new month was started when the new moon was first observed.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这个函数可以处理一直到1年(公元前3761年)的日期,但这种使用可能没有意义。犹太历法已经使用了几千年,但在早期并没有公式来确定一个月份的开始。当第一次观测到新月时,一个新的月份就开始了。

trans-unit.source: An array in PHP is actually an ordered map. A map is a type that associates values to keys. This type is optimized for several different uses; it can be treated as an array, list (vector), hash table (an implementation of a map), dictionary, collection, stack, queue, and probably more. As array values can be other arrays, trees and multidimensional arrays are also possible.
trans-unit.target: PHP中的数组实际上是有序映射。映射是一种将值与键相关联的类型。该类型针对多种不同用途进行了优化。可以将其视为数组，列表（向量），哈希表（地图的实现），字典，集合，堆栈，队列，甚至可能更多。由于数组值可以是其他数组，因此树和多维数组也是可能的。

trans-unit.source: An array including the sub-string of matched part by last mb_ereg_search(), mb_ereg_search_pos(), mb_ereg_search_regs(). It returns FALSE on error;

trans-unit.source: An artificial delay is introduced in the worker in this example to simulate a long running process. There is only one worker running for this example.

trans-unit.source: An assertion is a test on the characters following or preceding the current matching point that does not actually consume any characters. The simple assertions coded as \b, \B, \A, \Z, \z, ^ and $ are described in escape sequences. More complicated assertions are coded as subpatterns. There are two kinds: those that look ahead of the current position in the subject string, and those that look behind it.
trans-unit.target: 断言是对当前匹配点之后或之前的字符的测试，实际上并不消耗任何字符。在转义序列中描述了编码为\ b，\ B，\ A，\ Z，\ z，^和$的简单断言。更复杂的断言被编码为子模式。有两种：一种在主题字符串中当前位置的前面，另一种在主题字符串的后面。

trans-unit.source: An assertion subpattern is matched in the normal way, except that it does not cause the current matching position to be changed. Lookahead assertions start with (?= for positive assertions and (?! for negative assertions. For example, \w+(?=;) matches a word followed by a semicolon, but does not include the semicolon in the match, and foo(?!bar) matches any occurrence of "foo" that is not followed by "bar". Note that the apparently similar pattern (?!foo)bar does not find an occurrence of "bar" that is preceded by something other than "foo"; it finds any occurrence of "bar" whatsoever, because the assertion (?!foo) is always TRUE when the next three characters are "bar". A lookbehind assertion is needed to achieve this effect.
trans-unit.target: 断言子模式以常规方式匹配，只是它不会导致当前匹配位置发生变化。前瞻性断言以（？=表示肯定断言，以（？！表示否定断言。例如，\ w +（？=;）匹配一个单词，后跟一个分号，但不包括分号，而foo（？ ！bar）匹配出现在“ foo”之后的“ bar”，请注意，看起来相似的模式（？！foo）bar找不到出现在“ bar”之前的“ foo”以外的东西；它会发现任何出现的“ bar”，因为断言（？！foo）始终为 TRUE 当接下来的三个字符是“ bar”时。需要一个后置断言来实现此效果。

trans-unit.source: An example of PHP's automatic type conversion is the multiplication operator '*'. If either operand is a float, then both operands are evaluated as floats, and the result will be a float. Otherwise, the operands will be interpreted as integers, and the result will also be an integer. Note that this does not change the types of the operands themselves; the only change is in how the operands are evaluated and what the type of the expression itself is.
trans-unit.target: PHP的自动类型转换的一个示例是乘法运算符'*'。如果任何一个操作数都是float，则两个操作数都将被评估为float，结果将是float。否则，操作数将被解释为integer，结果也将是integer。请注意，这并不会改变类型的操作数本身的; 唯一的变化是操作数的求值方式以及表达式本身的类型。

trans-unit.source: An optimization catches some of the more simple cases such as (a+)*b where a literal character follows. Before embarking on the standard matching procedure, PCRE checks that there is a "b" later in the subject string, and if there is not, it fails the match immediately. However, when there is no following literal this optimization cannot be used. You can see the difference by comparing the behaviour of (a+)*\d with the pattern above. The former gives a failure almost instantly when applied to a whole line of "a" characters, whereas the latter takes an appreciable time with strings longer than about 20 characters.
trans-unit.target: 优化可以捕获一些更简单的情况，例如（a +）* b，其后紧跟文字字符。在开始标准匹配过程之前，PCRE检查主题字符串后面是否有“ b”，如果没有，则立即使匹配失败。但是，如果没有以下文字，则无法使用此优化。通过将（a +）* \ d的行为与上述模式进行比较，可以看到差异。前者在应用于整行“ a”字符时几乎立即失败，而后者在字符串长度超过约20个字符时花费相当长的时间。

trans-unit.source: An optional output_callback function may be specified. This function takes a string as a parameter and should return a string. The function will be called when the output buffer is flushed (sent) or cleaned (with ob_flush(), ob_clean() or similar function) or when the output buffer is flushed to the browser at the end of the request. When output_callback is called, it will receive the contents of the output buffer as its parameter and is expected to return a new output buffer as a result, which will be sent to the browser. If the output_callback is not a callable function, this function will return FALSE. This is the callback signature:
trans-unit.target: 可以指定一个可选的 output_callback 函数。此函数将字符串作为参数，并应返回一个字符串。当输出缓冲区被刷新（发送）或清理（使用ob_flush（），ob_clean（）或类似函数）或在请求结束时将输出缓冲区刷新至浏览器时，将调用该函数。当 output_callback 被调用时，它将收到输出缓冲区的内容作为参数并预期返回一个新的输出缓冲区作为结果，将被发送给浏览器。如果 output_callback 不是可调用的函数，则此函数将返回 FALSE 。这是回调签名：

trans-unit.source: An optional alignment specifier that says if the result should be left-justified or right-justified. The default is right-justified; a - character here will make it left-justified.

trans-unit.source: An optional padding specifier that says what character will be used for padding the results to the right string size. This may be a space character or a 0 (zero character). The default is to pad with spaces. An alternate padding character can be specified by prefixing it with a single quote ('). See the examples below.
trans-unit.target: 可选的填充说明符，说明将使用什么字符将结果填充到正确的字符串大小。这可以是空格字符或0（零字符）。默认设置为空格。可以通过用单引号（'）作为前缀来指定备用填充字符。请参阅下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: An optional precision specifier in the form of a period (.) followed by an optional decimal digit string that says how many decimal digits should be displayed for floating-point numbers. Additionally, the character to use when padding a number may optionally be specified between the period and the digit.

trans-unit.source: An optional sign specifier that forces a sign (- or +) to be used on a number. By default, only the - sign is used on a number if it's negative. This specifier forces positive numbers to have the + sign attached as well.

trans-unit.source: Another good example of expression orientation is pre- and post-increment and decrement. Users of PHP and many other languages may be familiar with the notation of variable++ and variable--. These are increment and decrement operators. In PHP, like in C, there are two types of increment - pre-increment and post-increment. Both pre-increment and post-increment essentially increment the variable, and the effect on the variable is identical. The difference is with the value of the increment expression. Pre-increment, which is written '++$variable', evaluates to the incremented value (PHP increments the variable before reading its value, thus the name 'pre-increment'). Post-increment, which is written '$variable++' evaluates to the original value of $variable, before it was incremented (PHP increments the variable after reading its value, thus the name 'post-increment').
trans-unit.target: 表达方向的另一个很好的例子是前后递增和递减。 PHP和许多其他语言的用户可能熟悉variable ++和variable--的表示法。这些是增量和减量运算符。在PHP中，就像在C中一样，有两种类型的增量-前增量和后增量。前增加和后增加本质上都增加了变量，并且对变量的影响是相同的。差异在于增量表达式的值。预增量，写为“ ++ $variable ”，求值为增量值（PHP在读取变量值之前先对变量进行增量，因此称为“预增量”）。后增量，写为“ $variable ++'在递增之前先求值$ variable的原始值（PHP在读取变量的值后将其递增，因此名称为“ post-increment”）。

trans-unit.source: Another thing to watch out for is that it is quite easy to receive false readiness notifications, i.e. the callback might be called with Ev::READ but a subsequent read() will actually block because there is no data. It is very easy to get into this situation. Thus it is best to always use non-blocking I/O: An extra read() returning EAGAIN (or similar) is far preferable to a program hanging until some data arrives.
trans-unit.target: 要注意的另一件事是，很容易接收到错误的就绪通知，即，可能使用 Ev::READ 调用了回调，但是随后的read（）实际上会阻塞，因为没有数据。很容易陷入这种情况。因此，最好始终使用非阻塞I / O：返回 EAGAIN （或类似值）的额外read（）比挂起直到某些数据到达的程序更可取。

trans-unit.source: Any new algorithm must be in core for at least 1 full release of PHP prior to becoming default. So if, for example, a new algorithm is added in 7.5.5, it would not be eligible for default until 7.7 (since 7.6 would be the first full release). But if a different algorithm was added in 7.6.0, it would also be eligible for default at 7.7.0.
trans-unit.target: 任何新的算法在成为默认算法之前,必须在 PHP 的至少一个完整版本的核心中出现。因此,例如,如果在 7.5.5 中加入了一个新算法,那么它在 7.7 之前不会成为默认版本(因为 7.6 是第一个完整版本)。但是如果在 7.6.0 中加入了不同的算法,那么在 7.7.0 中也会成为默认算法。

trans-unit.source: Any number of PGSQL_CONV_FORCE_NULL, PGSQL_DML_NO_CONV, PGSQL_DML_ESCAPE, PGSQL_DML_EXEC, PGSQL_DML_ASYNC or PGSQL_DML_STRING combined. If PGSQL_DML_STRING is part of the options then query string is returned. When PGSQL_DML_NO_CONV or PGSQL_DML_ESCAPE is set, it does not call pg_convert() internally.
trans-unit.target: 任意组合的 PGSQL_CONV_FORCE_NULL ， PGSQL_DML_NO_CONV ， PGSQL_DML_ESCAPE ， PGSQL_DML_EXEC ， PGSQL_DML_ASYNC 或 PGSQL_DML_STRING 均可。如果 PGSQL_DML_STRING 是 options 一部分，则返回查询字符串。当 PGSQL_DML_NO_CONV 或 PGSQL_DML_ESCAPE 设置，它不叫（）pg_convert内部。

trans-unit.source: Any number of PGSQL_CONV_IGNORE_DEFAULT, PGSQL_CONV_FORCE_NULL or PGSQL_CONV_IGNORE_NOT_NULL, combined.
trans-unit.target: 任意数量的 PGSQL_CONV_IGNORE_DEFAULT ， PGSQL_CONV_FORCE_NULL 或 PGSQL_CONV_IGNORE_NOT_NULL 组合在一起。

trans-unit.source: Any number of PGSQL_CONV_OPTS, PGSQL_DML_NO_CONV, PGSQL_DML_ESCAPE, PGSQL_DML_EXEC, PGSQL_DML_ASYNC or PGSQL_DML_STRING combined. If PGSQL_DML_STRING is part of the options then query string is returned. When PGSQL_DML_NO_CONV or PGSQL_DML_ESCAPE is set, it does not call pg_convert() internally.
trans-unit.target: 任意数量的 PGSQL_CONV_OPTS ， PGSQL_DML_NO_CONV ， PGSQL_DML_ESCAPE ， PGSQL_DML_EXEC ， PGSQL_DML_ASYNC 或 PGSQL_DML_STRING 均可。如果 PGSQL_DML_STRING 是 options 一部分，则返回查询字符串。当 PGSQL_DML_NO_CONV 或 PGSQL_DML_ESCAPE 设置，它不叫（）pg_convert内部。

trans-unit.source: Any parameters in parameter_array which start and end with single quotes will be taken as the name of a file to read and send to the database server as the data for the appropriate placeholder.
trans-unit.target: parameter_array中任何以单引号开头和结尾的 parameter_array 都将被视为要读取的文件的名称，并作为适当占位符的数据发送到数据库服务器。

trans-unit.source: Any request from client is initialized as a Yaf_Request_Http. you can get the rquest information like, uri query and post parameters via methods of this class.
trans-unit.target: 来自客户端的任何请求都将初始化为Yaf_Request_Http。您可以通过此类的方法获取rquest信息，例如uri查询和post参数。

trans-unit.source: Any resources which were locked, or allocated, during opening and use of the directory stream should be released.
trans-unit.target: 在打开和使用目录流期间被锁定或分配的任何资源都应该被释放。

trans-unit.source: Any returned value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何返回的值都会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Any scalar variable, array element or object property with a string representation can be included via this syntax. Simply write the expression the same way as it would appear outside the string, and then wrap it in { and }. Since { can not be escaped, this syntax will only be recognised when the $ immediately follows the {. Use {\$ to get a literal {$. Some examples to make it clear:
trans-unit.target: 可以通过此语法包括具有字符串表示形式的任何标量变量，数组元素或对象属性。只需以与出现在字符串外部相同的方式编写表达式，然后将其包装在{和}中。由于{无法转义，因此仅在$紧跟{之后才可以识别此语法。使用{\ $获得文字{$。一些示例可以使您清楚：

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent calls to any mysqli function (except mysqli_options()) will fail until mysqli_real_connect() was called.
trans-unit.target: 任何mysqli的功能的任何后续调用（除mysqli_options（） ）将会失败，直到mysqli_real_connect（）被调用。

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent calls to any mysqli_stmt function will fail until mysqli_stmt_prepare() was called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用mysqli_stmt_prepare（）之前，对任何mysqli_stmt函数的任何后续调用都将失败。

trans-unit.source: Any undefined constant that is unqualified like FOO will produce a notice explaining that PHP assumed FOO was the value of the constant. Any constant, qualified or fully qualified, that contains a backslash will produce a fatal error if not found.
trans-unit.target: 任何不合格的未定义常量（例如FOO）都会产生一条通知，说明PHP假定FOO是该常量的值。如果没有找到任何包含反斜杠的常量，合格或完全合格，将产生致命错误。

trans-unit.source: Any unused SSL parameters may be given as NULL
trans-unit.target: 任何未使用的SSL参数都可以指定为 NULL

trans-unit.source: Any user-supplied data substituted directly into a query string should be properly escaped.
trans-unit.target: 用户提供的任何直接替换为查询字符串的数据都应正确转义。

trans-unit.source: Any valid PHP code may appear inside a function, even other functions and class definitions.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的PHP代码都可能出现在函数内部，甚至其他函数和类定义也是如此。

trans-unit.source: Any value less than or equal to 0 means unlimited.
trans-unit.target: 任何小于或等于0的值都表示无限制。

trans-unit.source: Any whitespace in the format string matches any whitespace in the line from the file. This means that even a tab \t in the format string can match a single space character in the input stream.
trans-unit.target: 在任何空白 format 字符串匹配从文件中的行任何空白。这意味着即使格式字符串中的制表符\ t也可以匹配输入流中的单个空格字符。

trans-unit.source: Any whitespace in the format string matches any whitespace in the input stream. This means that even a tab \t in the format string can match a single space character in the input stream.
trans-unit.target: 格式字符串中的任何空格都与输入流中的任何空格匹配。这意味着即使格式字符串中的制表符\ t也可以匹配输入流中的单个空格字符。

trans-unit.source: Any whitespace in the format string matches any whitespace in the input string. This means that even a tab \t in the format string can match a single space character in the input string.
trans-unit.target: 格式字符串中的任何空白字符都会与输入字符串中的任何空白字符相匹配。这意味着即使是格式字符串中的tab/t也可以匹配输入字符串中的一个空格字符。

trans-unit.source: Apache
trans-unit.target: Apache

trans-unit.source: Apart from common user-defined function, anonymous functions can also be passed to a callback parameter.
trans-unit.target: 除了常见的用户定义函数外，匿名函数还可以传递给回调参数。

trans-unit.source: Apart from keeping the process non-blocking(which is a useful on its own sometimes), EvIdle watchers are a good place to do "pseudo-background processing" , or delay processing stuff to after the event loop has handled all outstanding events.
trans-unit.target: 除了使进程保持非阻塞状态（有时它本身很有用）之外，EvIdle监视程序还是进行“伪后台处理”或将处理内容延迟到事件循环处理完所有未决事件之后的好地方。

trans-unit.source: Apart from that the passed code must be valid PHP. This includes that all statements must be properly terminated using a semicolon. 'echo "Hi!"' for example will cause a parse error, whereas 'echo "Hi!";' will work.
trans-unit.target: 除此之外，传递的代码必须是有效的PHP。这包括必须使用分号正确终止所有语句。例如，'echo“ Hi！”'会导致解析错误，而'echo“ Hi！”;' 将工作。

trans-unit.target: 与任务关联的应用上下文

trans-unit.target: 应用程序/上下文特定信息字符串。

trans-unit.source: Applies a color vector to each pixel in the image. The length of the vector is 0 for black and white and at its maximum for the midtones. The vector weighing function is f(x)=(1-(4.0*((x-0.5)*(x-0.5)))).
trans-unit.target: 对图像中的每个像素应用一个颜色向量。向量的长度对黑白来说是0,对中间调来说是最大的。矢量权重函数为f(x)=(1-(4.0*((x-0.5)*(x-0.5)))。

trans-unit.source: Applies a convolution matrix on the image, using the given coefficient and offset.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的系数和偏移量,在图像上应用卷积矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Applies a custom convolution kernel to the image.
trans-unit.target: 对图像应用自定义卷积核。

trans-unit.source: Applies a digital filter that improves the quality of a noisy image.
trans-unit.target: 应用数字滤波器,提高噪点图像的质量。

trans-unit.source: Applies a digital filter that improves the quality of a noisy image. Each pixel is replaced by the median in a set of neighboring pixels as defined by radius.
trans-unit.target: 应用数字滤波器,提高噪声图像的质量。每一个像素都被半径定义的一组相邻像素的中值所取代。

trans-unit.source: Applies a special effect filter that simulates an oil painting. Each pixel is replaced by the most frequent color occurring in a circular region defined by radius.
trans-unit.target: 应用模拟油画的特殊效果滤镜。每个像素都被半径定义的圆形区域中出现频率最高的颜色所取代。

trans-unit.source: Applies a special effect to the image, similar to the effect achieved in a photo darkroom by selectively exposing areas of photo sensitive paper to light. Threshold ranges from 0 to QuantumRange and is a measure of the extent of the solarization.
trans-unit.target: 将特殊效果应用到图像上,类似于在照片暗房中通过有选择地将感光纸的区域暴露在光线下所达到的效果。阈值范围从0到QuantumRange,是日晒程度的衡量标准。

trans-unit.source: Applies a special effect to the image, similar to the effect achieved in a photo darkroom by sepia toning. Threshold ranges from 0 to QuantumRange and is a measure of the extent of the sepia toning. A threshold of 80 is a good starting point for a reasonable tone.
trans-unit.target: 对图像施加特殊效果,类似于照片暗房中深褐色调的效果。阈值范围从 0 到 QuantumRange,是衡量深褐色调的程度。80的阈值是一个合理色调的良好起点。

trans-unit.source: Applies a translation to the current coordinate system which moves the coordinate system origin to the specified coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 对当前坐标系进行平移,将坐标系原点移动到指定坐标。

trans-unit.source: Applies a user supplied kernel to the image according to the given morphology method.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定的形态学方法,将用户提供的内核应用到图像上。

trans-unit.source: Applies a wave filter to the image. This method is available if Imagick has been compiled against ImageMagick version 6.2.9 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 对图像应用波浪滤镜。如果Imagick是根据ImageMagick 6.2.9或更新的版本编译的,则此方法可用。

trans-unit.source: Applies an arithmetic, relational, or logical expression to a pseudo image.
trans-unit.target: 将算术、关系或逻辑表达式应用于伪图像。

trans-unit.source: Applies gamma correction to the given gd image given an input and an output gamma.
trans-unit.target: 在给定输入和输出伽马的情况下，将伽马校正应用于给定的gd image 。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified rotation to the current coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的旋转应用到当前的坐标空间。

trans-unit.source: Applies the user-defined callback function to each element of the array array.
trans-unit.target: 将用户定义的 callback 函数应用于 array array的每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Applies the user-defined callback function to each element of the array. This function will recurse into deeper arrays.
trans-unit.target: 将用户定义的 callback 函数应用于 array 的每个元素。此函数将递归到更深的数组中。

trans-unit.source: Apply color transformation to an image. The method permits saturation changes, hue rotation, luminance to alpha, and various other effects. Although variable-sized transformation matrices can be used, typically one uses a 5x5 matrix for an RGBA image and a 6x6 for CMYKA (or RGBA with offsets). The matrix is similar to those used by Adobe Flash except offsets are in column 6 rather than 5 (in support of CMYKA images) and offsets are normalized (divide Flash offset by 255)
trans-unit.target: 对图像进行色彩变换。该方法允许饱和度变化、色调旋转、亮度到alpha以及其他各种效果。虽然可以使用不同大小的变换矩阵,但通常对RGBA图像使用5x5矩阵,对CMYKA(或带偏移的RGBA)使用6x6矩阵。该矩阵与Adobe Flash使用的矩阵类似,只是偏移量在第6列而不是第5列(支持CMYKA图像),而且偏移量是标准化的(将Flash偏移量除以255)。

trans-unit.source: Apply the effect along this angle.
trans-unit.target: 沿着这个角度应用效果。

trans-unit.source: Applys an arithmetic, relational, or logical expression to an image. Use these operators to lighten or darken an image, to increase or decrease contrast in an image, or to produce the "negative" of an image.
trans-unit.target: 将算术、关系或逻辑表达式应用到图像上。使用这些运算符可以使图像变亮或变暗,增加或减少图像的对比度,或产生图像的 "负片"。

trans-unit.source: Array with fewer members is smaller, if key from operand 1 is not found in operand 2 then arrays are uncomparable, otherwise - compare value by value (see following example)
trans-unit.target: 成员较少的数组比较小,如果操作数1中的键在操作数2中找不到,那么数组是不可比较的,否则--按值比较(见下面的例子)。

trans-unit.source: Array with keys "x", "y", "width" and "height".

trans-unit.source: Array with keys 0 to 5.
trans-unit.target: 阵列,键为0至5。

trans-unit.source: Array with the opened archive's signature in hash key and MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512, or OpenSSL in hash_type. This signature is a hash calculated on the entire phar's contents, and may be used to verify the integrity of the archive. A valid signature is absolutely required of all executable phar archives if the phar.require_hash INI variable is set to true.
trans-unit.target: 哈希密钥中具有打开的存档签名的数组，而hash_type中具有MD5，SHA-1，SHA-256，SHA-512或OpenSSL的数组。该签名是根据整个phar内容计算得出的哈希值，可用于验证档案的完整性。如果phar.require_hash INI变量设置为true ，则所有可执行phar归档文件都绝对需要有效的签名。

trans-unit.source: Array with the varnish statistic snapshot. The array keys are identical to that in the varnishstat tool.
trans-unit.target: 含有varnish统计快照的数组。数组中的键与varnishstat工具中的相同。

trans-unit.source: Arrays
trans-unit.target: Arrays

trans-unit.source: Arrays →
trans-unit.target: 数组→

trans-unit.source: Arrays and objects are considered equal to zero when calculating the sum.
trans-unit.target: 计算总和时,数组和对象被认为等于零。

trans-unit.source: Arrays from which elements will be extracted. Values from later arrays overwrite the previous values.
trans-unit.target: 从数组中提取元素。从后面的数组中提取的值会覆盖前面的值。

trans-unit.source: Arrays, which are valid callables, are allowed as variable functions.
trans-unit.target: 数组,是有效的可调用函数,允许作为变量函数。

trans-unit.source: As resource variables hold special handles to opened files, database connections, image canvas areas and the like, converting to a resource makes no sense.
trans-unit.target: 由于资源变量对打开的文件，数据库连接，图像画布区域等具有特殊的句柄，因此转换为资源没有任何意义。

trans-unit.source: As foreach relies on the internal array pointer in PHP 5, changing it within the loop may lead to unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 由于foreach依赖于PHP 5中的内部数组指针，因此在循环中对其进行更改可能会导致意外行为。

trans-unit.source: As idate() always returns an integer and as they can't start with a "0", idate() may return fewer digits than you would expect. See the example below.
trans-unit.target: 由于idate（）始终返回整数，并且它们不能以“ 0”开头，因此idate（）返回的位数可能少于您的预期。请参见下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: As mysqli_fetch_all() returns all the rows as an array in a single step, it may consume more memory than some similar functions such as mysqli_fetch_array(), which only returns one row at a time from the result set. Further, if you need to iterate over the result set, you will need a looping construct that will further impact performance. For these reasons mysqli_fetch_all() should only be used in those situations where the fetched result set will be sent to another layer for processing.
trans-unit.target: 由于mysqli_fetch_all（）在单个步骤中将所有行作为数组返回，因此它可能比某些类似函数（如mysqli_fetch_array（））消耗更多的内存，后者仅一次从结果集中返回一行。此外，如果需要遍历结果集，则将需要一个循环结构，这将进一步影响性能。由于这些原因，mysqli_fetch_all（）仅应在将获取的结果集发送到另一层进行处理的情况下使用。

trans-unit.source: As PHP's integer type is signed, but dechex() deals with unsigned integers, negative integers will be treated as though they were unsigned.
trans-unit.target: 由于PHP的整数类型是带符号的，但是dechex（）处理无符号的整数，因此负整数将被视为无符号整数。

trans-unit.target: 作为一种方便的速记,如果在一个非捕获子模式的开头需要任何选项设置,选项字母可以出现在"? "和":"之间。因此,这两种模式

trans-unit.target: 解决方法是，可以将Easter_days（）与DateTime和DateInterval一起使用，以计算PHP时区中Easter的开始，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: As all the keys in the above example are cast to 1, the value will be overwritten on every new element and the last assigned value "d" is the only one left over.
trans-unit.target: 由于上述示例中的所有键都强制转换为1，因此该值将在每个新元素上被覆盖，最后分配的值“ d”是剩下的唯一一个值。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, we can implement an xrange() generator, which will only ever need enough memory to create an Iterator object and track the current state of the generator internally, which turns out to be less than 1 kilobyte.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方案，我们可以实现xrange（）生成器，该生成器仅需要足够的内存来创建Iterator对象并在内部跟踪生成器的当前状态，结果该状态小于1 KB。

trans-unit.source: As an interesting note, PharData::buildFromIterator() can also be used to copy the contents of an existing phar, tar or zip archive, as the PharData object descends from DirectoryIterator:
trans-unit.target: 有趣的是，PharData :: buildFromIterator（）也可以用于复制现有phar，tar或zip归档文件的内容，因为PharData对象是从DirectoryIterator继承的：

trans-unit.source: As described in the section about expressions, expression is evaluated to its Boolean value. If expression evaluates to TRUE, PHP will execute statement, and if it evaluates to FALSE - it'll ignore it. More information about what values evaluate to FALSE can be found in the 'Converting to boolean' section.
trans-unit.target: 如有关表达式的部分所述，表达式将被评估为其布尔值。如果expression的计算结果为 TRUE ，PHP将执行语句，如果它的计算结果为 FALSE ，它将忽略它。有关哪些值评估为 FALSE 的更多信息，请参见“转换为布尔值”部分。

trans-unit.source: As directives are handled as the file is being compiled, only literals may be given as directive values. Variables and constants cannot be used. To illustrate:
trans-unit.target: 由于指令是在编译文件时处理的,所以只能将字面值作为指令值。不能使用变量和常量。举例说明一下。

trans-unit.source: As in fopen() (rb or wb) but can also include a compression level (wb9) or a strategy: f for filtered data as in wb6f, h for Huffman only compression as in wb1h. (See the description of deflateInit2 in zlib.h for more information about the strategy parameter.)
trans-unit.target: 与fopen（）（rb或wb）中一样，但也可以包括压缩级别（wb9）或策略：f对于wb6f中的过滤数据，h对于Huffman仅压缩，如wb1h中。（见的描述deflateInit2在 zlib.h 有关策略参数的更多信息）。

trans-unit.source: As in C or Perl, PHP requires instructions to be terminated with a semicolon at the end of each statement. The closing tag of a block of PHP code automatically implies a semicolon; you do not need to have a semicolon terminating the last line of a PHP block. The closing tag for the block will include the immediately trailing newline if one is present.
trans-unit.target: 就像在C或Perl中一样,PHP要求在每条语句的最后用分号结束。PHP代码块的结束标签自动地暗示了分号;你不需要在PHP代码块的最后一行用分号结束。代码块的结束标签将包括紧随其后的换行符,如果有的话。

trans-unit.source: As in Perl, you can access a value from the array inside double quotes. However, with PHP you'll need to enclose your array between curly braces.
trans-unit.target: 就像在Perl中一样,你可以在双引号中访问数组中的一个值。然而,在 PHP 中,你需要用大括号将数组括起来。

trans-unit.source: As in single quoted strings, escaping any other character will result in the backslash being printed too. Before PHP 5.1.1, the backslash in \{$var} had not been printed.
trans-unit.target: 与单引号字符串 s一样，转义任何其他字符也将导致反斜杠也被打印。在PHP 5.1.1之前，尚未打印\ {$ var}中的反斜杠。

trans-unit.source: As mentioned above, if no key is specified, the maximum of the existing integer indices is taken, and the new key will be that maximum value plus 1 (but at least 0). If no integer indices exist yet, the key will be 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，如果未指定键，则采用现有整数索引的最大值，并且新键将是该最大值加1（但至少为0）。如果尚无整数索引，则键将为0（零）。

trans-unit.source: As noted above, providing the salt option in PHP 7.0 will generate a deprecation warning. Support for providing a salt manually may be removed in a future PHP release.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，在PHP 7.0中提供salt选项将生成弃用警告。在以后的PHP版本中可能会删除对手动提供盐的支持。

trans-unit.source: As noted in the return value section, imagecropauto() returns FALSE when there is either nothing to crop or the whole image would be cropped. In this example we have an image resource $im which should be automatically cropped only if there is something to crop; otherwise we want to proceed with the original image.
trans-unit.target: 如返回值部分所述，当没有裁剪或整个图像被裁剪时，imagecropauto（）将返回 FALSE 。在这个例子中，我们有一个图像资源$ im，它只有在要裁剪的东西时才自动裁剪；否则，我们要继续原始图像。

trans-unit.source: As noted in the warning above, testing floating point values for equality is problematic, due to the way that they are represented internally. However, there are ways to make comparisons of floating point values that work around these limitations.
trans-unit.target: 正如上面的警告所指出的,由于浮点值的内部表示方式,测试浮点值的平等性是有问题的。然而,有一些方法可以绕过这些限制对浮点值进行比较。

trans-unit.source: As of 2.1.18, Yaf supports Controllers autoloading for user script side, (which means the autoloading triggered by user php script, eg: access a controller static property in Bootstrap or Plugins), but autoloader only try to locate controller class script under the default module folder, which is "APPLICATION_PATH/controllers/".
trans-unit.target: 从2.1.18开始,Yaf支持Controllers在用户脚本端自动加载,(这意味着由用户的php脚本触发的自动加载,例如:访问Bootstrap或Plugins中的controller静态属性),但自动加载器只尝试在默认的模块文件夹下定位controller类脚本,即 "APPLICATION_PATH/controllers/"。

trans-unit.source: As of 5.3.6, this parameter is a bitmask for the following options:
trans-unit.target: 从5.3.6开始,这个参数是以下选项的位掩码。

trans-unit.source: As of 5.4.0, this parameter can be used to limit the number of stack frames printed. By default (limit=0) it prints all stack frames.
trans-unit.target: 从5.4.0版本开始，此参数可用于限制打印的堆栈帧数。默认情况下（ limit = 0）它将打印所有堆栈帧。

trans-unit.source: As of 5.4.0, this parameter can be used to limit the number of stack frames returned. By default (limit=0) it returns all stack frames.
trans-unit.target: 从5.4.0版本开始，此参数可用于限制返回的堆栈帧数。默认情况下（ limit = 0）则返回所有的栈帧。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 4.2.0, the default value for the PHP directive register_globals is off. The PHP community discourages developers from relying on this directive, and encourages the use of other means, such as the superglobals.
trans-unit.target: 自PHP 4.2.0起，PHP指令的默认值register_globals的是关闭。PHP社区鼓励开发人员不要依赖此指令，并鼓励使用其他方式，例如superglobals。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 4.3, the function more properly reflects the functionality as dictated by the » RFC2087. The array return value has changed to support an unlimited number of returned resources (i.e. messages, or sub-folders) with each named resource receiving an individual array key. Each key value then contains an another array with the usage and limit values within it.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 4.3开始，该功能可以更正确地反映»RFC2087所指示的功能。数组返回值已更改为支持无限数量的返回资源（即消息或子文件夹），每个命名资源都接收一个单独的数组键。然后，每个键值都包含另一个数组，其中包含用法和限制值。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 4.3, this function can (potentially) work on any kind of stream. In PHP 4.3, socket based streams are still the only kind supported in the PHP core, although streams from other extensions may support this function.
trans-unit.target: 在 PHP 4.3 中,这个函数可以(潜在地)在任何类型的流上工作。在 PHP 4.3 中,基于套接字的流仍然是 PHP 核心支持的唯一类型,尽管其他扩展的流也可能支持这个函数。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 4.3.0 PCNTL uses ticks as the signal handle callback mechanism, which is much faster than the previous mechanism. This change follows the same semantics as using "user ticks". You must use the declare() statement to specify the locations in your program where callbacks are allowed to occur for the signal handler to function properly (as used in the example below).
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 4.3.0开始，PCNTL使用ticks作为信号句柄回调机制，比以前的机制要快得多。此更改遵循与使用“ 用户滴答 ” 相同的语义。您必须使用clarify（）语句来指定程序中允许发生回调以使信号处理程序正常运行的位置（如以下示例中所使用）。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 4.3.2, the default mode is set to binary for all platforms that distinguish between binary and text mode. If you are having problems with your scripts after upgrading, try using the 't' flag as a workaround until you have made your script more portable as mentioned before
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 4.3.2开始，所有区分二进制和文本模式的平台的默认模式都设置为二进制。如果升级后脚本遇到问题，请尝试使用“ t”标志作为解决方法，直到如前所述使脚本更具可移植性

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 4.3.3, calling session_start() after the session was previously started will result in an error of level E_NOTICE. Also, the second session start will simply be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 4.3.3开始，在先前启动会话之后调用session_start（）将导致级别 E_NOTICE 的错误。同样，第二个会话开始将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5 the FILE_USE_INCLUDE_PATH constant can be used to trigger include path search. This is not possible if strict typing is enabled, since FILE_USE_INCLUDE_PATH is an int. Use TRUE instead.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5开始， FILE_USE_INCLUDE_PATH 常量可用于触发包含路径搜索。如果启用了严格类型输入，则这是不可能的，因为 FILE_USE_INCLUDE_PATH 是一个int。请改用 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.0.0 rmdir() can also be used with some URL wrappers. Refer to Supported Protocols and Wrappers for a listing of which wrappers support rmdir().
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.0.0起，rmdir（）也可以与某些 URL包装器一起使用。请参阅支持的协议和包装器，以获取包装器支持rmdir（）的列表。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.0.0 unlink() can also be used with some URL wrappers. Refer to Supported Protocols and Wrappers for a listing of which wrappers support unlink().
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.0.0开始，unlink（）也可以与某些 URL包装器一起使用。请参阅支持的协议和包装器，以获取包装器支持unlink（）的列表。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.0.0, this function can also be used with some URL wrappers. Refer to Supported Protocols and Wrappers to determine which wrappers support stat() family of functionality.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.0.0开始，此功能还可以与某些 URL包装器一起使用。请参阅支持的协议和包装器，以确定哪些包装器支持stat（）系列功能。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.0.0, this function can also be used with some URL wrappers. Refer to Supported Protocols and Wrappers to determine which wrappers support stat() family of functionality.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.0.0开始，此功能还可以与某些 URL包装器一起使用。请参阅支持的协议和包装器，以确定哪些包装器支持stat（）系列功能。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.0.5 the write and close handlers are called after object destruction and therefore cannot use objects or throw exceptions. Exceptions are not able to be caught since will not be caught nor will any exception trace be displayed and the execution will just cease unexpectedly. The object destructors can however use sessions.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.0.5开始， write 和 close 处理程序在对象销毁后被调用，因此不能使用对象或引发异常。无法捕获异常，因为将不会捕获异常，也不会显示任何异常跟踪，并且执行只会意外停止。但是，对象析构函数可以使用会话。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.1, when called with no arguments, mktime() throws an E_STRICT notice: use the time() function instead.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.1开始，当不带任何参数调用时，mktime（）会引发 E_STRICT 通知：请改用time（）函数。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.1.0, the is_dst parameter became deprecated. As a result, the new timezone handling features should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.1.0开始， is_dst 参数已弃用。因此，应改用新的时区处理功能。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.1.0, this parameter became deprecated. As a result, the new timezone handling features should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.1.0开始,这个参数就被废弃了。因此,应该使用新的时区处理功能。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.2.2, DateTime objects can be compared using comparison operators.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.2.2开始，可以使用比较运算符比较 DateTime对象。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.2.2, the \g escape sequence can be used for absolute and relative referencing of subpatterns. This escape sequence must be followed by an unsigned number or a negative number, optionally enclosed in braces. The sequences \1, \g1 and \g{1} are synonymous with one another. The use of this pattern with an unsigned number can help remove the ambiguity inherent when using digits following a backslash. The sequence helps to distinguish back references from octal characters and also makes it easier to have a back reference followed by a literal number, e.g. \g{2}1.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.2.2开始，\ g转义序列可用于子模式的绝对和相对引用。此转义序列后必须跟一个无符号数或一个负数，可以选择用大括号括起来。序列\ 1，\ g1和\ g {1}彼此同义。将此模式与无符号数字一起使用可以帮助消除在反斜杠后使用数字时固有的歧义。该序列有助于将反向引用与八进制字符区分开，并且使反向引用后跟文字数字（例如\ g {2} 1）更加容易。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.3, you can use namespace:
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.3中,你可以使用命名空间。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.3.0 heredocs and nowdocs can be used in any static data context, including property declarations.
trans-unit.target: 自PHP 5.3.0 here文档和nowdocs可以在任何静态数据上下文中使用，包括属性声明。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.3.0 is_callable() reports constructors as not being callable. This affects PHP 5 style constructors (__construct) as well as PHP 4 style constructors (i.e. methods with the same name as the class). Formerly, both cases have been considered callable.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.3.0开始，is_callable（）将构造函数报告为不可调用。这会影响PHP 5样式构造函数（__construct）以及PHP 4样式构造函数（即与类同名的方法）。以前，这两种情况都被认为是可以召回的。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.3.0, PHP contains its own implementation and will use that if the system lacks of support for one or more of the algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.3.0中,PHP包含了自己的实现,如果系统缺乏对一个或多个算法的支持,就会使用它。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.3.0, PHP implements a feature called late static bindings which can be used to reference the called class in a context of static inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.3.0中,PHP实现了一个叫做后期静态绑定的功能,它可以用来在静态继承的上下文中引用被调用的类。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.3.0, it's possible to initialize static variables and class properties/constants using the Heredoc syntax:
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.3.0中,可以使用Heredoc语法初始化静态变量和类属性/常量。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.3.0, it's possible to reference the class using a variable. The variable's value can not be a keyword (e.g. self, parent and static).
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.3.0开始，可以使用变量来引用类。变量的值不能是关键字（例如self，parent和static）。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.3.0, it's possible to reference the class using a variable. The variable's value cannot be a keyword (e.g. self, parent and static).
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.3.0开始，可以使用变量来引用类。变量的值不能是关键字（例如self，parent和static）。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.3.0, the stream_context_set_default() function can be used to set the default context.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.3.0开始，stream_context_set_default（）函数可用于设置默认上下文。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.3.3, methods with the same name as the last element of a namespaced class name will no longer be treated as constructor. This change doesn't affect non-namespaced classes.
trans-unit.target: 从 PHP 5.3.3 开始,与名字间隔类的最后一个元素名称相同的方法将不再被视为构造函数。这个变化不会影响非命名空间类。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.4 it is possible to array dereference the result of a function or method call directly. Before it was only possible using a temporary variable.
trans-unit.target: 从 PHP 5.4 开始,可以直接对函数或方法调用的结果进行数组析出。之前只能使用临时变量来实现。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.4 string offsets have to either be integers or integer-like strings, otherwise a warning will be thrown. Previously an offset like "foo" was silently cast to 0.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.4开始，字符串偏移量必须是整数或类似整数的字符串，否则将引发警告。以前，像“ foo”这样的偏移量被无声地强制转换为0。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.4 you can also use the short array syntax, which replaces array() with [].
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.4开始，您还可以使用短数组语法，该语法用[]替换array（）。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.4, anonymous functions may be declared statically. This prevents them from having the current class automatically bound to them. Objects may also not be bound to them at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.4开始,匿名函数可以静态声明。这可以防止当前类自动绑定到它们。对象也不能在运行时被绑定到它们上。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.4.0 you can use session_register_shutdown() or simply use the 'register shutdown' flag when invoking session_set_save_handler() using the OOP method and passing an instance that implements SessionHandlerInterface.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.4.0开始，可以在使用OOP方法调用session_set_save_handler（）并传递实现SessionHandlerInterface的实例时，使用session_register_shutdown（）或仅使用“ register shutdown”标志。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.4.0, PHP implements a method of code reuse called Traits.
trans-unit.target: 在 PHP 5.4.0 中,PHP 实现了一种叫做 Traits 的代码重用方法。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.4.0, the above example will raise an E_COMPILE_ERROR error.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.4.0开始，以上示例将引发 E_COMPILE_ERROR 错误。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.4.0, there are only two ways to access data from your HTML forms. Currently available methods are listed below:
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.4.0中,只有两种方法可以从HTML表单中访问数据。目前可用的方法如下。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.4.0, when declared in the context of a class, the current class is automatically bound to it, making $this available inside of the function's scope. If this automatic binding of the current class is not wanted, then static anonymous functions may be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.4.0开始，在类的上下文中声明时，当前类会自动绑定到它，从而使$ this在函数的作用域内可用。如果不需要这种自动绑定当前类，则可以使用静态匿名函数代替。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.4.0, you can call any callable stored in a variable.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.4.0开始，您可以调用存储在变量中的任何可调用对象。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.5 it is possible to array dereference an array literal.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.5开始,可以对一个数组的文字进行数组解除引用。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.5.0 E_DEPRECATED level error is emitted when passing in the "\e" modifier. As of PHP 7.0.0 E_WARNING is emitted in this case and "\e" modifier has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.5.0 E_DEPRECATED ，传入“ \ e”修饰符时会发出E_DEPRECATED级别错误。从PHP 7.0.0起，在这种情况下会发出 E_WARNING ，并且“ \ e”修饰符无效。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.6 aliasing or importing function and constant names is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 5.6中,允许使用别名或导入函数和常量名。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.6.0, hash_algos() will return the following list of algorithm names.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.6.0开始，hash_algos（）将返回以下算法名称列表。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 5.6.1 can also be specified as INI_SCANNER_TYPED. In this mode boolean, null and integer types are preserved when possible. String values "true", "on" and "yes" are converted to TRUE. "false", "off", "no" and "none" are considered FALSE. "null" is converted to NULL in typed mode. Also, all numeric strings are converted to integer type if it is possible.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.6.1开始，也可以指定为 INI_SCANNER_TYPED 。在此模式下，尽可能保留布尔，空和整数类型。字符串值“ true”，“ on”和“ yes”转换为 TRUE 。“ false”，“ off”，“ no”和“ none”被视为 FALSE 。在键入模式下，“ null”将转换为 NULL 。另外，如果可能，所有数字字符串都将转换为整数类型。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 7.0.0, instead of being undefined and platform-dependent, NaN and Infinity will always be zero when cast to integer.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 7.0.0开始，NaN和Infinity不会被不确定和依赖于平台，而是在强制转换为integer时始终为零。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 7.0.7, if type is omitted, it is automatically detected from the type of the param: boolean and integer are treated as SQLITE3_INTEGER, float as SQLITE3_FLOAT, null as SQLITE3_NULL and all others as SQLITE3_TEXT. Formerly, if type has been omitted, it has defaulted to SQLITE3_TEXT.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 7.0.7开始，如果省略 type ，则会从 param 的类型中自动检测出：boolean和integer被视为 SQLITE3_INTEGER ，float被视为 SQLITE3_FLOAT ，null被视为 SQLITE3_NULL ，所有其他 SQLITE3_TEXT 视为SQLITE3_TEXT。以前，如果 type 被省略，则默认为 SQLITE3_TEXT 。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 7.0.7, if type is omitted, it is automatically detected from the type of the value: boolean and integer are treated as SQLITE3_INTEGER, float as SQLITE3_FLOAT, null as SQLITE3_NULL and all others as SQLITE3_TEXT. Formerly, if type has been omitted, it has defaulted to SQLITE3_TEXT.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 7.0.7开始，如果忽略 type ，则将从 value 的类型中自动检测出：boolean和integer被视为 SQLITE3_INTEGER ，float被视为 SQLITE3_FLOAT ，null被视为 SQLITE3_NULL ，所有其他 SQLITE3_TEXT 视为SQLITE3_TEXT。以前，如果 type 被省略，则默认为 SQLITE3_TEXT 。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 7.1.0 list() can now also contain explicit keys, which can be given as arbitrary expressions. Mixing of integer and string keys is allowed; however, elements with and without keys cannot be mixed.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 7.1.0开始，list（）现在还可以包含显式键，可以将其指定为任意表达式。允许混合使用整数和字符串键；但是，带和不带键的元素不能混合使用。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 7.1.0 also negative numeric indices are supported.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 7.1.0开始，还支持负数值索引。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 7.1.0 the handler callback is given a second argument containing the signinfo of the specific signal. This data is only supplied if the operating system has the signinfo_t structure. If the OS does not implement siginfo_t NULL is supplied.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 7.1.0开始,处理程序的回调得到了第二个参数,其中包含特定信号的signinfo。只有当操作系统有signinfo_t结构时才会提供这些数据。如果操作系统没有实现sigininfo_t结构,则提供NULL。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 7.1.0 visibility modifiers are allowed for class constants.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP 7.1.0中,类常量允许使用可见性修饰符。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 7.1.0, an ArgumentCountError will be thrown if the callback function requires more than 2 parameters (the value and key of the array member). Previously, if the callback function required more than 2 parameters, an error of level E_WARNING would be generated each time array_walk() calls callback.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 7.1.0开始，如果 callback 函数需要两个以上的参数（数组成员的值和键），则将引发ArgumentCountError。以前，如果 callback 函数需要两个以上的参数，则每次array_walk（）调用 callback 时，都会生成E_WARNING级别的错误。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 7.1.0, class constants may be defined as public, private, or protected. Constants declared without any explicit visibility keyword are defined as public.
trans-unit.target: 从 PHP 7.1.0 开始,类常量可以被定义为 public、private 或 protected。没有任何明确的可见性关键字的常量被定义为public。

trans-unit.source: As of PHP 7.2.0 and libzip 1.2.0 the password is used to decompress the archive, and is also the default password for ZipArchive::setEncryptionName() and ZipArchive::setEncryptionIndex(). Formerly, this function only set the password to be used to decompress the archive; it did not turn a non-password-protected ZipArchive into a password-protected ZipArchive.
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 7.2.0和libzip 1.2.0开始，该密码用于解压缩存档，也是ZipArchive :: setEncryptionName（）和ZipArchive :: setEncryptionIndex（）的默认密码。以前，此功能仅设置用于解压缩归档文件的密码。它没有将未受密码保护的ZipArchive转换为受密码保护的ZipArchive。

trans-unit.source: As of runkit version 0.5, certain Sandbox settings may be modified on the fly using ArrayAccess syntax. Some settings, such as active are read-only and meant to provide status information. Other settings, such as output_handler may be set and read much like a normal array offset. Future settings may be write-only, however no such settings currently exist.
trans-unit.target: 从Runkit版本0.5开始，可以使用ArrayAccess语法即时修改某些沙箱设置。某些设置（例如 active 是只读的，旨在提供状态信息。可以设置和读取其他设置，例如 output_handler ，就像正常数组偏移一样。将来的设置可能是只写的，但是当前不存在此类设置。

trans-unit.source: As of runkit version 0.5, this function is deprecated and is scheduled to be removed from the package prior to a 1.0 release. The output handler for a given Runkit_Sandbox instance may be read/set using the array offset syntax shown on the Runkit_Sandbox class definition page.
trans-unit.target: 从Runkit版本0.5开始，不推荐使用此功能，并计划在1.0发行版之前从软件包中删除该功能。可以使用Runkit_Sandbox类定义页面上显示的数组偏移量语法读取/设置给定Runkit_Sandbox实例的输出处理程序。

trans-unit.source: As opposed to defining constants using define(), constants defined using the const keyword must be declared at the top-level scope because they are defined at compile-time. This means that they cannot be declared inside functions, loops, if statements or try/ catch blocks.
trans-unit.target: 与使用define（）定义常量相反，使用const关键字定义的常量必须在顶级范围内声明，因为它们是在编译时定义的。这意味着它们不能在函数，循环，if语句或try / catch块内声明。

trans-unit.source: As opposed with isset(), property_exists() returns TRUE even if the property has the value NULL.
trans-unit.target: 与isset（）相反，即使属性的值为 NULL ，property_exists（）也会返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.target: 通过:'bar'

trans-unit.target: 作为传递:数组(

trans-unit.source: As stated above, directly converting an array, object, or resource to a string does not provide any useful information about the value beyond its type. See the functions print_r() and var_dump() for more effective means of inspecting the contents of these types.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，直接将array，object或resource转换为字符串不会提供有关该类型以外的值的任何有用信息。有关检查这些类型的内容的更有效方法，请参见函数print_r（）和var_dump（）。

trans-unit.source: As string with additional headers to be set on the mail
trans-unit.target: 作为字符串,包含要在邮件上设置的附加标题。

trans-unit.source: As such, the to parameter should not be an address in the form of "Something <someone@example.com>". The mail command may not parse this properly while talking with the MTA.
trans-unit.target: 因此， to 参数不应是“ Something <someone@example.com>”形式的地址。与MTA交谈时，mail命令可能无法正确解析此命令。

trans-unit.source: As the Error hierarchy does not inherit from Exception, code that uses catch (Exception $e) { ... } blocks to handle uncaught exceptions in PHP 5 will find that these Errors are not caught by these blocks. Either a catch (Error $e) { ... } block or a set_exception_handler() handler is required.
trans-unit.target: 由于Error层次结构不是从Exception继承的，因此使用 catch (Exception $e) { ... } 块来处理PHP 5中未捕获的异常的代码将发现这些Error未被这些块捕获。需要 catch (Error $e) { ... } 块或set_exception_handler（）处理函数。

trans-unit.source: As the output is dependent upon the underlying C library, some conversion specifiers are not supported. On Windows, supplying unknown conversion specifiers will result in 5 E_WARNING messages and return FALSE. On other operating systems you may not get any E_WARNING messages and the output may contain the conversion specifiers unconverted.
trans-unit.target: 由于输出取决于基础C库，因此不支持某些转换说明符。在Windows上，提供未知的转换说明符将导致5 E_WARNING 消息并返回 FALSE 。在其他操作系统上，您可能不会收到任何 E_WARNING 消息，并且输出可能包含未转换的转换说明符。

trans-unit.source: As the output shows, the foreach iterated through all of the visible properties that could be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 如输出所示，foreach遍历了所有可以访问的可见属性。
